title: The Walking Dead confirms Lauren Cohan’s Maggie will return for season 10
text:
The Walking Dead season 10 will bring back Maggie (Picture: Getty/AMC)

The Walking Dead has confirmed Lauren Cohan’s Maggie Rhee will return in the show’s tenth season.

The announcement was made at the show’s New York Comic-Con panel, where Lauren appeared on stage in a hockey mask disguise before her identity was revealed to attendees.

We last saw Maggie in season nine episode What Comes After, where she was seen comforting Michonne (Danai Gurira) after seeing the bridge explode where Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) was stood.

That episode ended with a six year time jump, where we later revealed Maggie and her son Hershel Jr travelled to Georgie’s community to learn about their ways.

Danai Gurira, Lauren Cohan, and Norman Reedus pose backstage at a panel for AMC’s The Walking Dead Universe (Picture: Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images for AMC)

Lauren Cohan and Danai Gurira (Picture: Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images for AMC)

At the panel, showrunner Angela Kang also announced the show will return for an eleventh season – so it’s likely Maggie’s return will pan out towards the end of season 10.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Danai Gurira is also leaving the show in the upcoming season, so it’s likely Maggie will step forward as a key character replacement of sorts.

Lauren took a break from the show to star in ABC show Whiskey Cavalier, which was cancelled after one season in May earlier this year.

The show also revealed new character Princess is joining the show next season, which could mark the arrival of a significant storyline from the comics.

If you need more on season 10, Metro.co.uk recently spoke to Siddiq’s Avi Nash about the challenges to come and Michonne’s exit.

The Walking Dead season 10 kicks off on Sunday 6 October in the US, and returns in the UK on Fox Monday 7 October.

MORE: The Walking Dead casts Paola Lázaro as key character Princess in season 10

MORE: The Walking Dead producer is ‘very hopeful’ that Lauren Cohan will return as Maggie
description: Maggie's return has been confirmed for The Walking Dead season 10 in New York, as the show is renewed for season 11.
